document_title: Eclampsia: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: san-giat.json_3_Which pregnant women are at high risk of eclampsia?
subsection_content:
MSc. Dr. Dinh Thi Hien Le said that all pregnant women with preeclampsia or a history of the disease are at risk of having seizures.
In addition, some other subjects at high risk of getting the disease include:
Pregnant women with gestational or chronic hypertension;; Pregnant women over 35 years old or under 20 years old;; Pregnant women pregnant with twins or triplets;; Pregnant woman pregnant for the first time;; Pregnant women with gestational diabetes or other conditions affecting blood vessels;; Pregnant women with kidney disease.
subsection_title: san giat.json. Which pregnant women are at high risk of eclampsia?
